p:
The incorporation of another metal to control the catalyst oxidation state is exploited also in another class of bifunctional catalysts such as complex perovskites. Jung et al. investigated nanostructured La
x (Ba 0.5Sr 0.5) 1â€“ x Co 0.8Fe 0.2O 3-d materials and used EXAFS to study the effect of the calcination temperature on its structure, demonstrating that no significant structure degradation takes place after 100 charging/discharging cycles.
628 One can note here that the element-specificity of the XAS method is of great advantage for studies of such complex multielement systems.
